ThemeConfig Class Reference
[Config]

#include <ThemeConfig.hpp>


Static Public Member Functions

static INT GetFontId (SystemFontId id, const Theme &theme)
static const Theme & GetTheme (INT idx)
static INT GetThemeCount ()

Detailed Description

Allows accessing the theme configuration. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

Member Function Documentation

static INT ThemeConfig::GetFontId (  SystemFontId  id,
const Theme &  theme
)  [static]
 

Returns:
Font ID which corresponds to the system-font ID id of the theme theme. It is recommended to respect the language settings and dynamically use the corresponding font. E. g. when the current set language is Chinese, another font ID may returned than for English.

static const Theme& ThemeConfig::GetTheme (  INT  idx  )  [static]
 

Returns a reference to the theme with the index idx. The number of available themes is defined by ThemeConfig::GetThemeCount.

static INT ThemeConfig::GetThemeCount (   )  [static]
 

Returns the number of available themes. The theme instances can be accessed by ThemeConfig::GetTheme(INT idx).
